nodes.text: Remba, referred to as Ama by other members of her family, was a female farmer who lived on Tangenine and owned a farm with her lover Kelven and the rest of her family, Lauren Mel Coelho and Julien. They were being extorted by the Malandro syndicate and when she failed to pay fees to them, their leader Annaz came to kill her, Kelven and their workers. Their children went to live with their gran.
